LanguageData.LTF_BlocksMediStone.label: medistone blocks
LanguageData.LTF_BlocksMediStone.description: Blocks of solid medistone. Medistone is a midly hard stone.
LanguageData.LTF_ChunkMediStone.label: medistone chunk
LanguageData.LTF_ChunkMediStone.description: A chunk of rock. Can be cut into usable stone blocks.
